content.body: I know it’s almost (or already, depending on your time zone) the weekend, but I thought I’d re-up my previous request for code samples.  These are just base examples, nothing fancy or particularly clever needed.  URLs to existing examples (other than https://github.com/tc39/proposal-intl-segmenter/blob/master/README.md; I already mined that document out) are most welcome, as is any assistance on this.  Thanks!
Eric Meyer: how should we give feedback? I can look at https://github.com/mdn/content/compare/main...meyerweb:intl-segmenter , but cannot leave comments on a non-PR compare view
content.formatted_body: Eric Meyer: how should we give feedback? I can look at https://github.com/mdn/content/compare/main...meyerweb:intl-segmenter , but cannot leave comments on a non-PR compare view

content.body: Oh, good point.  I made it a draft pull request so comments and contributions should be easier now.
